backend/main.mo: Actor storing per-button click counts with functions to record clicks and query counts.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata mapping a subscription-link update feature to related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries describing various frontend files and components in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with meta tags, PWA setup, icons, and root mount element.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest declaring app metadata, colors, start URL, and icon assets.
frontend/public/offline.html: Offline fallback page with simple styling, reload button, and auto-reconnect logic.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and network‑fallback behavior with offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling all sections, navigation, search handling, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/BoostlyLink.tsx: Component showing the site URL with copy‑to‑clipboard functionality and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a site footer with brand info, resource links, social icons, and a dynamic copyright line.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays a hero banner with growth messaging, CTA buttons, and a promotional image.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Simple layout wrapper providing a full-height flex column container for page content.
frontend/src/components/MarketingNav.tsx: Implements a responsive navigation bar with scroll behavior, search, and mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/BroadTo: Renders cards with guidance, disclaimers, and tips for broad content topics using provided data.
frontend/src/components/sections/Content: Shows cards detailing different content types with descriptions, optional disclaimers, and tips.
frontend/src/components/sections/CoreGro: Renders a section showing core growth tips and actionable checklists using cards, icons, and mapped content arrays.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Displays a FAQ section with an accordion that lists questions and answers from provided content.
frontend/src/components/sections/GetBoos: Provides PWA installation options, installation status messages, and platform-specific app install instructions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Payment: Shows monetization options for Apple Pay and Cash App, tracks click counts, and opens external payment links.
frontend/src/components/sections/Platfor: Displays platform-specific growth tips using a tabbed UI with icons and mapped tip lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/Subscri: Presents monthly and annual subscription plans, tracks subscription link clicks, and handles external checkout navigation.
frontend/src/components/sections/ToolsRe: Renders a resources section with categorized tool lists using cards and icons, mapping predefined categories into UI elements.
frontend/src/components/SiteSearch.tsx: Provides a searchable dropdown component with keyboard navigation, result handling, and clearing.
frontend/src/config/subscriptionLinks.ts: Exports monthly and annual Stripe checkout URLs for subscriptions.
Defines guidance items for broad content topics with metadata, disclaimers, keywords, and detailed tips.
frontend/src/content/contentTypeGuidance: Provides structured guidance for different content types including categories, keywords, and tip lists.
frontend/src/content/growthGuidance.ts: Exports growth tips and checklists for social media improvement, each with descriptions and actionable points.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Centralizes platform-specific tips and FAQs for search indexing, covering major social platforms.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentClickCounts: Tracks and mutates payment button click counts via backend actor calls using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Manages PWA installation prompts, tracking installability, installation state, and triggering the install flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes backend actor and loading state as a placeholder for additional backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode colors, typography, and utility classes including highlight animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load and logs registration results.
frontend/src/search/scrollAndHighlight.t: Scrolls to a target element and applies a temporary highlight and focus effect.
frontend/src/search/searchIndex.ts: Builds a unified search index from content sources and provides tokenized relevance-based search.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, utilities, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the Boostly project's current state, including goals for a social‑media growth site, app integration, and monetization. Lists architectural notes, existing features, and versioned project metadata.
